name: NewYorkStateFacts
0:
”Alexa, open new york state facts”
”Alexa, start new york state facts”
”Alexa, launch new york state facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: new york state facts
des: This skill gives you a new fact every time you start the app. After the app gives the fact, the app ends. This is great for people looking to learn new things. If you want the skill to stop just say "Alexa, Stop"
